extendedIngredients.aisle: Nut butters, Jams, and Honey;Health Foods
extendedIngredients.name: honey
mango
extendedIngredients.originalString: 1 medium mango, peeled, pitted and cut into chunks

recipes.title: Tropical Fruit Drink
recipes.instructions: Directions                                                                                In a blender, combine the first five ingredients; cover and process until smooth. Add ice cubes; cover and process until blended. Stir in soda. Pour into chilled tall glasses; serve immediately.                                        Yield: 4 servings.                                                                                                                         Originally published as Tropical Fruit Drink in  Light & TastyFebruary/March 2004, p33                                                                                                                                                                                                        Nutritional Facts                                                                             One serving (1 cup) equals 130 calories, trace fat (trace saturated fat), 0 cholesterol, 4 mg sodium, 33 g carbohydrate, 3 g fiber, 1 g protein. Diabetic Exchanges: 2 fruit.                                                                                                                                                                    Print                                                                                    Add to Recipe Box                            Email a Friend

steps.step: In a blender, combine the first five ingredients; cover and process until smooth.
Add ice cubes; cover and process until blended. Stir in soda.
Pour into chilled tall glasses; serve immediately.
